"A.P.238/4/9/12:30": "That's enough! Excellent work. I am truly inspired by your effort!"
"But it seems that your performance is just a little lacking!"
"But you've managed to persevere until the end, and that's most important in ARKS."
"Unfortunately, you didn't obtain a high enough rank for the exhibition match I had planned, but you still did a great job!"
"You should head back, everyone is waiting for you!"
"Nothing went wrong with this event at all! My planning skills are perfect!"
"But, I think that's partly because everyone participating did their best!"
"Because of that, I feel the need to give a special present on this occasion!"
"Yes, that would be a mock battle with me!"
"Sixth in the Council of Six, the title that's pouring with elegance. Don't be shy, come at me with everything you have!"
"Nah, I'm going to refuse your reward."
"What apathy. Come on, we came all of this way, how about you try your best until the end?"
"That, and I want to see how strong you are!"
"Nope, I really couldn't care less."
"What!? Come on! I'm the Sixth in the Council of Six, it's my responsibility to know this stuff!"
"Like, <%me>. I have a decent idea of how strong they are!"
"But Sara, I've never even freaking seen you before today!"
"And I've met everyone in ARKS, which means you must not be in ARKS!"
"Because I go around annoying each and every person, so they remember my beautiful face!"
"You call that beautiful?"
"What!? How can you not love this amazing mug?"
"Are you going to stay on this topic until someone agrees with you?"
"No, it's not like that! You might be in ARKS, but how do I know if your heart is full of justice or not!?"
"That's right, I must confirm that it's justice you fight for!"
"Uhhh, how about no? Besides, you just want to fight for the sake of it."
"I don't mind if that's how you take it. I can only do two things - fight, and help people by fighting."
"Sorry, <%me>, it looks like we have to do this. Let's hurry up and get it over with."
"All right, let's go!"
